duties_responsibilities.duty: Help turn around and grow businesses across multiple industries, improve their ROI, and coach and mentor sales reps for future growth.
Use over 1,000 collective years of executive sales leadership experience to help organizations meet their vision and goals.
Create sales strategy, process, and execution to deliver sustainable sales performance improvement to clients.
Contract with companies that need to outsource their sales leadership.
Use sales expertise and leadership skills valued and appreciated by SMB owners.

education_certification.credential: 10+ years of Senior Sales Leadership experience
